member.name: P:RWEST.Nexus.MDM.Contracts.IMdmEntity.Links
member.summary:
Gets or sets the Links collection.
This is the collection of atom links that may provide further information allowing for a level 3 REST API i.e. hypermedia commands embedded in the data.
